oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: List of Namaqua, Koranna and |xam words by ≠kasin (Klaas Katkop), including body parts, relations and other information of daily life.
Koranna-Hottentot Words, with their Bushman and English translations from #kásin. (B XXV. 2365-2373, 2375-2413).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: Koranna
|xam vocabulary
